snippet: Photo filtering software is becoming more sophisticated, and some photographers share filters they have created themselves.
abstract: Photo filtering software is becoming more sophisticated, and some photographers share filters they have created themselves; filter apps provide thousands of ways to tweak the colors, rearrange the background or add new textures to pictures.
lead_paragraph: Photo filtering software is becoming more sophisticated, and some photographers share filters they have created themselves.

headline.seo: With Filters, Photos Take On Multiple Identities
headline.main: With Filters, Photos Take On Multiple Identities
headline.print_headline: With Filters, Photos Take On Multiple Identities
